```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

<br> 

Code chunks allow you execute code and embed the results within your R Markdown document.

<br>

<span style="color: blue;">**Resources**:</span> Check out [knitr: Elegant, flexible, and fast dynamic report generation with R](https://yihui.org/knitr/options/) by *Yihui Xie* for an nice overview of code chunk options.
